snippet: Giants safety Antrel Rolle said he was unsure about his status for the remainder of the preseason after spraining his right ankle during practice this week.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants safety Antrel Rolle says he is unsure about his status for the remainder of the preseason after spraining his right ankle during practice; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Giants safety Antrel Rolle said he was unsure about his status for the remainder of the preseason after spraining his right ankle during practice this week.
